notes.subject: Take out the trash
notes.body: The trash goes out on Wednesdays at 9p.m.

notes.subject: Do the dishes
notes.body: The dishes were left in the sink from the other night

notes.subject: Fold the laundry
notes.body: Two loads of laundry need to be folded and put away

notes.subject: Duis nec libero a sem euis
notes.body: Tonight we're having penne alla vodka. The recipe is on the fridge
